name: A Light In The Dark (itch) (AverageGamesStudio, DJSayori)
name_original: A Light In The Dark (itch) (AverageGamesStudio, DJSayori)
description:
Venture into an unknown world, and bring back the light from the deep darkness that has taken over!

Armed by light fragments and your brain, you'll start your adventure in the dark world, which is traversed through several paths. Make sure you don't get lost in the darkness.

And most importantly, DON'T LOSE YOUR LIGHT!

A Light In The Dark, by Danish-based indie studio Average Games Studio, is a 2D platformer where you have to explore the world, and restore the light to it by solving puzzles and surviving the cold consuming darkness.

Make your way through the dark and unknown landscape, use light fragments to light up braziers so you regain memories, light up areas to make enemies dissapear, and make your way to the evil that's behind this darkness.

**A Light In The Dark is a story about life and death, that some might find upsetting. Player discretion is advised.**

**This is an early demo with more to come. We are working on the full game and just want feedback on this vertical slice**

Controls
  • Choose between WASD and arrow-keys in "Options" in the main menu.
  • When you choose, the other needed keys will be asssigned to fit with your handplacement. 
  • Keyboard only for now.
